channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: ユニビジョンのニュース部門のトップ・キャスターだったLeón Krauze氏が、同局がトランプ氏により好意的な報道にシフトしたと報じられる中、同局を退社（Ted Johnson/Deadline）
item.description:
Ted Johnson / Deadline:
León Krauze, a top anchor for Univision's news division, leaves the network amid reports that the outlet has shifted to a much more favorable coverage of Trump  —  - Michael Strahan Returns To ‘Good Morning America’ After Time Off Due Personal Family Matters — Update

item.title: オサマ・ビン・ラディンが2002年に書いた米国のイスラエル支援を批判する書簡がTikTokで拡散され、Guardian紙が取り上げる（404 Media）。
item.description:
404 Media:
The Guardian takes down a 2002 letter written by Osama Bin Laden criticizing US support of Israel, after the letter went viral on TikTok  —  “The transcript published on our website 20 years ago has been widely shared today on social media without its original context.  Therefore we have decided to take it down."

item.title: シンガポールを拠点とするCaldecott Music GroupのCEO兼創設者であるMeng Ru Kuok氏が、Bustle Digital GroupからGawkerの商標とドメインを取得。
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Meng Ru Kuok, the CEO and founder of Singapore-based Caldecott Music Group, acquires Gawker's trademarks and domain, but not archives, from Bustle Digital Group  —  Get ready for Gawker 3.0: The twice-shuttered blog site has a new owner, who plans to bring the gossipy pop-culture brand back to life — but not in exactly the same way.

item.title: ピュー：米国成人の30％がFacebookから、26％がYouTubeから、16％がInstagramから、14％がTikTokから、12％がXから、8％がRedditから、5％がNextdoorとLinkedInからニュースを定期的に入手している（Sarah Scire/Nieman Lab）。
item.description:
Sarah Scire / Nieman Lab:
Pew: 30% of US adults regularly get their news from Facebook; 26%, from YouTube; 16%, Instagram; 14%, TikTok; 12%, X; 8%, Reddit; and 5%, Nextdoor and LinkedIn  —  Facebook may be ready to divorce the news business, but it's still the No. 1 source of news on social media for Americans.

item.title: 欧米の報道機関、イスラエルとハマスの戦争写真の掲載をめぐり厳しい選択に直面、偽情報とフォトジャーナリスト規制で複雑化（New York Times）
item.description:
New York Times:
US and European newsrooms face tough choices over which Israel-Hamas war photographs to publish, complicated by disinformation and photojournalist restrictions  —  Digital disinformation and restrictions on photojournalists have complicated decision-making about the visual chronicle of the Israel-Hamas war.

item.title: FCC、「所得水準、人種、民族、肌の色、宗教、国籍」によるブロードバンド・アクセス制限を防ぐ規則を採択、ISPと米共和党は不満（Ryan Tracy/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Ryan Tracy / Wall Street Journal:
The FCC adopts a rule to prevent limiting broadband access by “income level, race, ethnicity, color, religion, or national origin”; ISPs and the GOP complain  —  Industry and GOP say rule goes too far, warn of a chilling effect on broadband investment

item.title: 調査結果2023年、米国成人の14％がTikTokで定期的にニュースを入手、2020年の3％から増加：18～29歳32％、30～49歳15％、50～64歳7％、65歳以上3％（Katerina Eva Matsa/Pew Research Center）
item.description:
Katerina Eva Matsa / Pew Research Center:
Survey: 14% of US adults regularly get news on TikTok in 2023, up from 3% in 2020: 32% aged 18 to 29, 15% aged 30 to 49, 7% aged 50 to 64, and 3% aged 65+  —  A small but growing share of U.S. adults say they regularly get news on TikTok.  This is in contrast with many other social media sites …

item.title: メモ：BuzzFeed発行人のダオ・グエンが退任し、ジェシカ・プロバスが後任に。
item.description:
Mark Stenberg / Adweek:
Memos: BuzzFeed Publisher Dao Nguyen steps down, replaced by Jessica Probus as the company moves from emphasizing its aggregated network to growing its brands  —  Veteran executive Jessica Probus will step up as its new publisher  —  Culture and entertainment publisher BuzzFeed Inc. unveiled …

item.title: 安定AIのオーディオ担当副社長エド・ニュートン＝レックス氏、著作権保護された作品に生成AIモデルをトレーニングすることはフェアユースであるという同社の見解に同意できないと辞任（Music Business Worldwide）
item.description:
Music Business Worldwide:
Stability AI VP of Audio Ed Newton-Rex resigns, saying he disagrees with the company's view that training generative AI models on copyrighted works is fair use  —  Ed Newton-Rex has quit his role at Stability AI.  In an exclusive op-ed, he shares why.

item.title: アマゾンは12月4日、ComixologyアプリをKindleに統合し、Comixologyユーザーが所有するすべてのコミックをKindleライブラリに自動的に統合する予定（Thomas Wilde/GeekWire）
item.description:
Thomas Wilde / GeekWire:
Amazon plans to merge its Comixology app with Kindle on December 4, and automatically integrate all comics that Comixology users own into their Kindle libraries  —  Amazon will merge its digital comics storefront Comixology with Kindle on Dec. 4, which will also involve the official end of service for the standalone Comixology app.

item.title: 社内メモ：オピニオン・コラムニストのファルハド・マンジュがニューヨーク・タイムズを去る（Ben Smith/@semaforben）
item.description:
Ben Smith / @semaforben:
Internal memo: opinion columnist Farhad Manjoo is leaving The New York Times  —  Farhad Manjoo @fmanjoo leaving the New York Times, per an internal note from opinion editor.

item.title: ニューヨーク・タイムズ誌のスタッフライターの退社処理にニューヨーク・タイムズ紙のギルドが異議を唱えたという情報筋の話から、ジャズミン・ヒューズの辞任について見てみよう（Charlotte Klein/Vanity Fair）。
item.description:
Charlotte Klein / Vanity Fair:
A look at Jazmine Hughes' resignation, as sources say The New York Times' guild objected to the handling of the New York Times Magazine staff writer's exit  —  The paper's guild has objected to the handling of award-winning journalist Jazmine Hughes's resignation, an episode that comes …

item.title: ニューズ・コーポレーションの会長としての最後の日、ルパート・マードックは「会社で積極的な役割を続けたい」と語り、「幸運な」人生を振り返った（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
On his last day as News Corp's chair, Rupert Murdoch said he hopes to “continue an active role in the company” and reflected on his “fortunate” life  —  “We should all be concerned about the suppression of debate by an intolerant elite who regard differing opinions as anathema …

item.title: YouTube、iOSで初めて強化されたビットレート1080p動画サポートをAndroid、ウェブ、スマートTVに追加、18歳以上のユーザーに達成バッジをデビュー（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
YouTube adds enhanced bitrate 1080p video support, first available on iOS, to Android, the web, and smart TVs, and debuts achievement badges for users 18 and up  —  YouTube is expanding a few new features for premium users, the company announced on Wednesday.

item.title: スロバキアの新首相が一部のメディアを敵対的と評し、アクセスを制限すると脅したことを受け、スロバキアのジャーナリストと監視団体が警戒を表明（Lili Bayer/The Guardian）
item.description:
Lili Bayer / The Guardian:
Slovakian journalists and watchdogs express alarm after Slovakia's new prime minister described some media outlets as hostile and threatened to restrict access  —  Robert Fico describes leading broadcasters and newspapers as hostile and says they are ‘unwelcome guests at government office’
